directions: Place ice into a cocktail shaker. Pour pisco, lime juice, bitter orange aperitif, simple syrup, lemon juice, and grapefruit juice into shaker. Shake a few times to combine; pour into a tall glass. Garnish with lemon twist.
ingredients: 3/4 fluid ounce bitter orange aperitif (such as Aperol®)
title: Cusco Cocktail
